name: Kroox Remade
description:
Made in 3 days in a game jam-like process.

Kroox Remade is a puzzle game where the objective is to mark all the cubes. However, each type of cube reacts differently and you must think about the best way to select them so that you can complete the puzzle in as few moves as possible.

This game, as the name implies, is a recreation of the game Kroox, created by Double Dash Studios. If you liked this version, please give the original a try. It is available on Android and iOS, and it's a really nice game.

AssetsBackground Images: Pixel Adventure by Pixel Frog

UI Assets: UI Pack by Kenney

Music: Cozy Shop by Alex Cook

Music: New Leaf by Alex Cook
